text: Elisabeth Andreassen (born 28 March 1958) is a Norwegian singer. She participated at the Eurovision Song Contest for Sweden in 1982, and for Norway in 1985 and 1996. == Discography == ===Solo albums=== *Angel of the Morning (1981) *I'm a Woman (1983) *Elisabeth Andreasson (1985) *Greatest Hits Vol. 2 (1985) *Greatest Hits (1986) *Älskar, älskar ej (1988) *Elisabeth (1990) *Stemninger (1992 to 1994) *Julestemninger (1993) *Elisabeth Andreassens bästa 1981-1995 (1995) *Eternity (1996) *Bettans jul (1996) *Så skimrande var aldrig havet (1997) *20 bästa (1998) *Kjærlighetsviser (2001) *A Couple of Days in Larsville (2004) *Short Stories (2005) *Spellemann (2009) *Julenatt (2009, Elisabeth Andreassen & Rein Alexander) *Kärleken & livet (2012) ==Other websites== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian singers
title: Elisabeth Andreassen
